name: Speculus
description:
< Any funds gained from the sell of the Speculus game will be re-invested in the updates and management! >

The story of two teenagers who have to repair their relationship through a magic mirror, which has been broken. By finding the pieces of the mirror, hidden in the room, the characters will get to know the past of each other. Obviously finding the pieces is not so easy! Complete every puzzle and repair the mirror in SPECULUS!

Game created during 2020 Global Game Jam in Sa Manifattura, Cagliari
